transcript:
Customer: Ram mangal bhavan ya ram mangal hari
Customer: Ram sitaram sitaram jai jai ram
Customer: Ram sitaram sitaram jai jai ram
Customer: Ram sitaram sitaram jai jai ram
Customer: Ram mangal bhavan
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji a rahi hai awaz
Executive: Hanji hanji good afternoon main IndiaMART se aapke account manager baat kar raha hun Ashutosh Pandey
Customer: Ji sir
Executive: Hanji ye aapne concern raise kari thi 9696 pe kya problems aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Kya ki thi?
Executive: Ye 9696 pe aapne call kiya tha concern raise kari thi kuch problems hai kya?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Kya kya problems hai? Kabhi kabhi to ek hi lead aati hai
Customer: Hmm hmm
Executive: Fir?
Customer: By lead vagarah karte hai by leads vagarah karte hai to ek hi aati hai kabhi kabhi to
Executive: Accha ek by lead aati hai?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Aur kabhi kabhi matlab apne hisab nahi hai sir
Customer: Dekho teen char mahine ka aur raha hai kuch ho jaye to bahut achi baat hai nahi to
Executive: Jarur jarur nahi nahi bilkul bilkul hoga abhi aap kya bolte hain ki aaj aapne pehli by lead consume ki hai na?
Customer: Haan dekha tha lekin pata nahi consume hui hai ki nahi hui
Executive: Hmm nahi ek by lead main dekh raha hun jo daily bonus ka jo ek milta hai na wo aapne pehli aaj consume ki hai theek hai main uska ek bar details bata de raha hun aapne I think jahan tak yaad hoga to aap bata sakte hain mere ko jaise aapke unka naam main bata raha hun aapko kaun si by lead aapne consume kari thi aapne aaj na aaj kitni tarikh hai 12 tarikh 12 tarikh ko aapne ek by lead stand stone cladding wall panel theek hai buyer ka name Rajput karke aa raha hai Udhampur
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Aap aap se inki baat hui hai?
Customer: Haan baat mere kisi mere bhaiya ne ki thi pata nahi unse hui thi ki nahi hui unse main sampark karunga
Executive: Theek hai ye service aap hi dekhte hain na?
Customer: Haan main bhi dekhta hun wo bhi dekh lete hain
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji to aap dono dekh lete hain jarur achi baat hai na dono log dekh rahe ho to ek bar mail open karenge kya?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Mail open karenge aap?
Customer: Abhi sir ek machine khuli hui hai isliye to mere thode kale hath ho rahe hain
Executive: Haan haan
Customer: To kyunki na ye jo aapne usi ke bare mein main aapko thoda experience share karke batata ki kaise kya karna hai jo by leads ke bare mein aap thodi problems aa rahi hai aapko theek hai jaise ek main lead dekh raha hun concrete wall panel isme aap deal karte hain kya?
Customer: Nahi
Executive: Haan ji concrete hello haan ji haan ji concrete wall panel ya stand stone wall panel mein
Customer: Haan stand stone wall panel mein to karte hain
Executive: Haan to abhi aap ek bar IndiaMART application open karenge kya main aapko dikhaunga ye leads?
Customer: Haan main line pe hun aap
Customer: Haan ji maine IndiaMART open kar liya hai
Executive: Ji abhi aap na pehli lead aap dekhiye kaun si lead aapko dikh rahi hai concrete wall panel?
Customer: Sir ye banta stone hi hai na kahin aur dusra haan haan to ye niche niche dekhiye wall panel aur ye niche likha hai na stand stand stone wall panel quantity inko 500 piece chahiye jo order value hai 10 se 20 lakh ki order value hai Ghaziabad Uttar Pradesh ki lead hai 19 minute pehle aayi hai aapke pass buyer ke agar details ki main baat karun to do saal se jyada purana hai buyer ka information theek hai to contact by now pe click karke ek bar call karun kya inko?
Customer: Haan ji haan iske aap dekhiye product mein is product mein aap deal karte hain iska diya hai ki sand sand stone wall panel likha hi hai quantity 500 piece chahiye order value bhi 10 se 20 lakh ki hai recent ki lead hai 19 minute pehle hi aayi hai theek hai to contact by now pe click kariye isko consume kariye
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Consume kar sakte hain haan aap inse baat kariye ga aur dekhiye baat abhi abhi main jo baat kar raha hun na abhi isse discuss kar lete hain
Customer: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahein
Customer: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahein
Customer: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahein
Customer: The person you are speak
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji
Customer: Concrete mein chahiye stone mein nahi chahiye
Executive: Stone mein nahi chahiye?
Customer: Haan dekho aisi aisi aati hai matlab mere pass
Executive: Accha accha maine aapko bataya maine baat bhi hai na haan haan ab unse baat ye to chalo achcha banda tha isne sir sir aapke pass concrete ho to batao mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai inhone matlab achcha positive response diya baat aage aise bolte hain kya bhaiya humko ye nahi aap humko pareshan kyun kar rahe ho aise bolte hain
Executive: Nahi nahi dekhiye aapko haan haan bahut sare hote hain customer main maan ke chalta hun aise bolte hain but aapko na aise hota hai na jaise ki koi bhi customer aap by lead consume kariye na to uska sabse pehle buyer ka jo details vitails hota hai na ki wo kitna din purana hai theek hai to us hisab se aap check karenge na to by lead aap consume kariye theek hai abhi aapne dekhiye na 19 minute pehle aapko dikha na aapke product se related isko need hai haan dikh bhi raha hai ki sand sand stone wall panels yahan pe mention bhi hai kis category ki chahiye theek hai but abhi baat karne ke baad hi to pata chal raha hai na ki nahi usko concrete wall panel mein chahiye samajh rahe hain?
Customer: Sahi hai
Customer: Haan
Customer: Sir mere sath ek bar video meet chahenge na to main kuch tarike aur bhi dikha sakta hun
Customer: Hello abhi main thodi der mein kar lun sir?
Customer: Kitne der mein aap free ho ja rahe hain bataiye jo main sari cheeze ek bar main aapko dikha 15 minute 15 minute mein ho jaunga
Executive: 15 minute mein ho jaunga theek hai to main ye jo aapne concern jo raise kari hai isko main close kar dun?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Ye jo jo aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai na to concern raise hota hai usko main close kar dun na aap se connect kar lunga
Customer: Ye sir maine nahi ki
Executive: Haan to wo matlab aap se to baat ho gayi hai na sir primary number aapka hi hai theek hai haan to usko main close kar dun?
Customer: Usse koi dikkat hai na aapko?
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab mere ko dikkat nahi mere ko ye hai ki aap aapka agar kuch issue hota hai tabhi aap 9696 pe call karte hain samajh rahe hain? haan wo bhi call mere pass hi aa rahi hai but aapke mere number bhi hai na aapke pass aap usse bhi connect kar sakte hain theek hai to wahan pe concern raise ho jata hai usko mujhe close karna hota hai
Customer: Theek hai close kar do
Executive: Theek hai main close kar deta hun ek bar aap apne bhaiya se jo bhi hai ek bar discussion kar lijiye ki meri baat ho gayi hai unse theek hai maine hi unko approval diya hai close karne ke liye theek hai kyunki jaise hi main close karunga na ek mail jayega aapke pass theek hai to usme hota hai ki aap satisfied hai not satisfied hai theek hai to aap satisfied hai aapke bolne pe hi main isko close kar raha hun theek hai
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Theek hai to aap ek bar baat kar lunga aap se number theek hai haan to aap unse ek bar baat kar lijiye ki main concern close kar raha hun aapke taraf se feedback mail jayega to aap please us pe matlab reply kar denge satisfied ka theek hai
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Wo mera feedback hota hai sir theek hai
Customer: Jagdish ji aur phone kar rahe hain ji
Executive: Close kar dun na sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving only one buylead.

- Buyleads are not according to customer needs.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check buyer details.

- Executive offered to show other ways to find leads.

- Executive explained the feedback process after closing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with his brother.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, application, feedback
